title: DeAndre Hopkins suspended; Most intriguing QB-WR combo; Draft Grade BS; Analyst, Leger Douzable
itunes:title: DeAndre Hopkins suspended; Most intriguing QB-WR combo; Draft Grade BS; Analyst, Leger Douzable
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with their reaction to the DeAndre Hopkins suspension. Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, and former Super Bowl champion Shaun O’Hara address how the DeAndre Hopkins suspension will impact Kyler Murray. Then the GMFB crew discusses which quarterback, receiver duo in the NFL is the most intriguing. Later, Kyle Brandt sounds off on draft grades, Shaun O’Hara speaks about Kevin Colbert’s last press conference and Kay Adams brings up the Cole Strange pick in the NFL Draft on Taco Bout It. They finish up being joined by analyst Leger Douzable and he shares his thoughts on the Jets and Ravens draft and then he shares why he doesn’t think the 49ers will trade Deebo Samuel.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
